about_the_game:
Communication will be your only way out!


Discover a new kind of cooperative puzzle-platformer VR game released yet in a totally new version!

One player is wearing a VR headset while another is controlling the levels on the computer screen, but there's a twist: computer screen are only 2D!

Will you be able to send the correct information from the headset to help them make a bridge for you to the end of each level?

So grab a friend and explore ten out of the 50+ levels of the complete game that will defy your understanding of space and challenge your communication skills.
